snippet.title: Endless War 2 (Browser/Flash) - Gameplay | No Commentary
snippet.description:
Endless War 2 is the second game in the series. It has four new campaigns: Counter-Terror Campaign, Terrorists Campaign, Post-Nuclear Campaign, and Bloody Campaign. It also introduces alternate attacks that can be initiated by pressing the space bar and adds an information bar at the bottom of the screen that shows ammo, gun name, caliber etc. Also new are "fast" bullets and grenades.

▌Browser & Flash/HTML5 Gameplays Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXEHhSievieGLNZRFyssXFWhppX_0vXHT

💰 Here you can buy games at good prices: https://www.g2a.com/n/ncgyt

Website - https://www.gameplays-archive.com

#Browser #Flash #Gameplay
